subject: [Bad] 'additional software terms' is a broken link in Amazon ToS
text:
"In addition to these Conditions of Use, the terms found [here](http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/?nodeId=508088#additionalsoftwareterms) apply to any software"
https://github.com/tosdr/tosback2/blob/265e49bf24a91076495ce1fddf279c4638421a66/crawl/amazon.com/Conditions%20of%20Use.txt#L140

but that link just links to the top of the current page. they probably meant to link to one or more of the
documents we track here:
https://github.com/tosdr/tosback2/blob/master/rules/amazon.com.xml
